effect.shortEffect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.
effect.full: This Pokémon cannot be forced out of battle by moves such as whirlwind. dragon tail and circle throw still inflict damage against this Pokémon. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the success rate while fishing is increased.

description.diamond-pearl: Negates moves that force switching out.
description.platinum: Negates moves that force switching out.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Negates foes’ moves that force switching out.
description.black-white: Negates all moves that force switching out.
description.black-2-white-2: Negates all moves that force switching out.
description.x-y: Negates all moves and items that force switching out.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Negates all moves and items that force switching out.
description.sun-moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
description.sword-shield: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
